reviewText: I was very disappointed in this book. I show three projects, but all were the same technique--often word for word instructions. I would have liked different styles & techniques to be demostrated.

This video was straight forward and to the point.  The easy how to steps were just like coloring in a coloring book. I so love glass art, now I will be able to do my own. I just loved this video and I made an excellent choice!
